name: Meadowland Whipping Cream
description: Meadowland double cream comes in 1l (litre) and is ideal for multipurpose use, to include as whipping cream on desserts like tiramisu or mousse as whipped cream or as cooking cream. Meadowland delivers the rich, creamy taste of dairy, with a good yield. It whips 1l to 2.5l volume, won’t split with acid or alcohol, won’t split when heated and has up to 4 hours whipped stability. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
